message.content:
Subject: Resignation from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. After much thought and consideration, I have decided to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day will be two weeks from today, on [Date of Last Day].

It has been a pleasure working with all of you over the past [Number] years. The time spent here has been both challenging and rewarding, and I am grateful for the opportunities that have come my way during this period. However, after careful reflection, I believe it is time to pursue new challenges in another company where I can continue to grow professionally.

During these final two weeks, I will do everything possible to ensure a smooth transition of responsibilities and knowledge transfer to my successor. Please let me know if there are any specific tasks or projects that need immediate attention before my departure date. Additionally, please advise on whether you would like me to assist with the recruitment process for my replacement.

Thank you once again for your understanding and support throughout my tenure at [Company Name]. I am confident that our team will continue to thrive under new leadership. If there are any questions or concerns regarding this decision, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via email or phone call.

Sincerely,

[Your Full Name]
